We sat outside at a lovely table.  The food was delicious.  We had:BIKINI de "CARLES ABELLAN" - this was basically high end grilled cheese finger sandwiches with truffle and ham.  So tasty!Pan con Tomato- it was simply bread and tomato and it was so good I spent the rest of my time in Barcelona trying to find a similar version.Ceviche- very classic peruvian high end style.  Great presentation and very fresh.Fried canned sardines - so tasty and flavorful and not at all fishy. A little addictive. Jamon iberico - best version of this we had until we got to Seville. Ham croquetas - typical version of these.  Very good.
